website_summaries.verdict: If you've been searching for a carry case that will hold 2 controllers, look no further. Generous size and adaptable features make this model a close contender for first place.
pros: Serious gamers with a comprehensive setup will appreciate the large capacity and multitude of compartments
Holds every imaginable accessory and even boasts an iPhone 6 cutout
Hard EVA shell combined with soft lined EVA foam cutouts offer protection from knocks and drops
Carrying options include an adjustable shoulder strap and side handle
cons: Some users had issues with the top of the case pushing down on the controller buttons

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: The case does a great job of protecting your console and accessories. We took it on vacation and it worked great. The only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is because of the smell. It has a VERY strong unpleasant odor. I used febreeze on it for a couple of weeks before our vacation and left it open to air out. The smell did dissipate but has not went completely away.
customer_reviews.author: Pandamonium

customer_reviews.title: Good all-around case
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid case. The foam cutouts are the right size and yet still flexible enough that I'd be comfortable putting more JoyCon grips in the pro controller slots if needed. The size of the case is also very reasonable. I was afraid it would be huge considering it is carrying a dock plus many additional accessories, but it's actually not bad at all. I'll probably still use my smaller case when traveling, but this is great for taking my Switch to use at someone else's house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mudge

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer has poor QC
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if every single N600 is like this, but the MicroSD slots in my case were on the bottom of the foam insert, not the top like the image. Also like the others, the shoulder buttons do get pressed down causing a constant drain on the batteries even if you turn your Switch and controllers off entirely. I imagine the N550 would be a better case since it is listed as being the thicker of the two, but a lower product number should never be the superior product. Instead of wasting time and money trying out the N550 I returned this and am getting the DACCKIT case. I saw two favorable video reviews about that one.
customer_reviews.author: Koitenshin

customer_reviews.title: TWO SPACES FOR PRO CONTROLLERS!!!
customer_reviews.text: That's the most appealing detail here is you can fit BOTH of your pro controllers in here so bringing your switch around doesn't include leaving ONE outside of the case. The case itself is strong, well protected, spaces for every piece, part, and game cartridges you have. Everything fits well (save for if you have sleeves or grip slips covers on your joy cons or the switch itself (everything fits SNUGLY normally). Overall just a wonderful buy for a switch lover who cares to protect their console for the long run and keep everything organized and together! 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case
customer_reviews.text: This case has an abundant amount of space for one's Switch and accessories. The handle is comfortable to hold and the inner pouches have a decent amount (albeit cheap feeling) of protective foam. The only issue I've had is that the front pouch that holds the Switch itself is a little too tight where when removing the Switch it can sometimes leave smear marks on your screen. As long as you have a good screen protector on your screen though this is not really a problem. Overall I've been fairly impressed with this case and it holds my Switch and two extra sets of controllers and an extra set of Joy-cons with room to spare for extra games and cords.
customer_reviews.author: KurtD0g

customer_reviews.title: Good case if you ignore the smell
customer_reviews.text: The case is extremely well made in terms of material, the size of the cutouts for accessories and games, and the amount of stuff you are able to fit in it. However, the case came with a strong smokey and rubbery smell that is impossible to get rid of. I tried using a mixture of soap, vinegar, and water to get it out, and it didn't work. I tried washing it a few times, and the smell is still there. Leaving it out in the sun for a day did nothing, and I gave up and decided to just leave it for a while. A month later, the case still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Shetal

customer_reviews.title: Controllers discharge when lid is closed
customer_reviews.text: The Nintendo Switch Pro Controllers will poll for a connection when the lid is closed because the foam cutout does not go high enough to prevent the padded insert from applying pressure to the shoulder buttons. A different cutout for the controllers with them facing down could fix this, but in the meantime, discharged controllers defeat the purpose of a travel case.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan W.

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! It holds pretty much everything you could ever need with your Switch. Each slot is tailored to fit a particular controller, and if you don't happen to have two Pro Controllers, you can easily fit other cables or small things inside. I fit my GameCube adapter inside one of the Pro Controller slots. The only slight issue is that the lid has a mesh web over it for fitting other items inside. Unfortunately, unless the items are pretty flat, the case won't close very well, but I'm too impressed with everything else to really mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Solid case, but not an everyday carry thing.
customer_reviews.text: I like to take my switch with me to conventions and other group outings, and this case lets me carry almost everything that I need. Cables, controllers, dock, and games. Everything fits in snugly and I don't have to worry about items being broken from the case getting knocked around. For me, this isn't a 'carry around everywhere' thing. When I'm just going around town, I'll leave this at home. There's just not enough room for third-party accessories like my grip case that I simply cannot play my Switch in handheld mode without.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT for my son’s switch! It hold everything needed! It’s normally scattered everywhere and we keep it all in an ugly tote. Wish I had found this sooner! Only con—the random stuff zipper storage compartment doesn’t hold a ton. We have steering wheels and other small attachments that won’t fit. But, overall, that’s not a huge deal! Still 5 stars and 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: janice bagley

customer_reviews.title: spacious for all my switch gear
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my switch gear as advertised (dock, cords/chargers/HDMI, 4 joycons (2 controllers for joycons), procontroller, 4 joycon wrist holder, lots of games, plastic mobile case for joycon handle extension) - I even managed to get hard plastic handle case (easier on my hands) inside case along the top portion. Easy to close even with 5-7 cords in zipper portion. Plenty of slots for games too! Controllers and switch are extremely secured (not too tight either) and does not even move when bumped around. I even feel comfortable enough with case with it falls a couple feet when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome case my only complaint is that it's too tight for the official nintendo controller sleeves and joystick covers. I can wedge my pro controllers in with those but they get constant joystick inputs which drain the controller battery and screw with you when your trying to play in the car with just the joycons or a quick session without unpacking everything. It also doesn't have space for the official nintendo hand grips. Other than that it's a really good case it just doesn't suit all of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: a h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: It's huge, first of all, which I wasn't expecting, but this isn't a bad thing. The case is a great size, fits everything well(snug) and will definitely protect my gear if I were to drop/bump it on something. The hard cover is durable and the strap is long and adjustable which is great. This makes life a lot easier now that I'm not toting my games around in a normal backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Hylian_Harpy

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you travel with your switch!
customer_reviews.text: Yes I'm almost 40, married, have a career and still play kids games. If you have a switch and travel with it this is a must. It's well made and the pieces fit like a glove! The only reason. I gave it 4 stars and not 5 is I wish it would hold one more controler. When I take it to family events and we play Mario Kart we do the split screen for 4 players. I bought an extra controller case for travel I use.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch case out there
customer_reviews.text: Best Switch case out there. I love it it holds everything I need. Cables cords, I don't use the Dock in that certain poket I bought two IMuto 30,000 just for my which on the go and it works perfectly with my 3.1 type c USB cable. I'm strictly handheld so yeah this is recommended for alot. Soon I'll have two Pro controllers to complete my collection. But so far so good
customer_reviews.author: BROKENSeriousBlack

customer_reviews.title: Great compact switch case!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice switch case! Is able to hold up to 32 games, a pro controller, the joy con grip, Nintendo switch, charging dock, as well as multiple cables. Sadly, there is not enough room for a second pro controller to fit in the place of the joy con grip. Also, when closed, the lid presses firmly enough to where it presses the buttons of the pro controller, and joy cons. Over time, this may cause wear to the inside fabric. (-1 star). Really wished there was enough room to fit my second pro controller.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best case EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am overly impressed with this case.. this case is of the highest quality inside and out and will safely carry and protect every aspect of your Nintendo Switch from the console, to the controls, to the power cords, anything and everything Nintendo Switch including games. This case exceeded my expectations and I am very happy to have it. For the best of the best, please buy this case for your Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Presses buttons when you close it. Can be fixed
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well made, in terms on materials. There's one flaw with it and that's the top part of the case will press down on the buttons of the pro controllers and drain the battery over time. I had to cut out the extra pocket and the came card sheet to fix this. I used an x-acto knife and it was pretty easy to do. This fixed the button pressing issue but it would have been nice to have the extra pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Switch on the Go
customer_reviews.text: I loved the case as soon as I opened it. It has all the space I need (more honestly as I do not have 2 Pro Controllers, but room to grow right?). Everything fit nice and snug inside the molded inserts inside and I've dropped it several times and don't even worry anymore. The Switch is great for traveling, especially visiting friends and family and this case makes it even easier.
customer_reviews.author: John Derek Tyson

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law and I purchased the Nintendo Switch for my son this Christmas. He loves it. We purchased this to keep his Switch safe when traveling. This is the best one he said to carry all the items he needs. He checked out the Switch before buying and learned he would need a small piece of felt to protect the screen when packed. Luckily I had several pieces for him to choose from. He is very happy with his purchase. He said he would recommend this case above all others.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Holds literally everything you could possibly want to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This case holds literally everything you could possibly want to take with you when traveling and protects it well. I've dropped it and it still protects everything inside. My only complaint is the first inside can push buttons on the controllers which can incidental power on the console, but can be mitigated by putting the console in airplane mode before packing it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Too shallow for switch controllers
customer_reviews.text: The case is too shallow and pushes down on your joycon buttons, causing them to try to pair with your switch. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dipper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great case for permanent storage or for transporting the whole system. Obviously not something if you want to just take the console places, but if you want to move your whole dock, extra controllers, etc -- you can't do better. Smatree makes great cases and this one is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: John Mickey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Docking 1 star because I notice the "pairing" lights when the controllers are installed. However, my husband assures me that if the switch has been turned off then it shouldn't affect the battery. I wish it had two extra slots for wrist straps, since this case is designed to carry 4 controllers, ??? why doesn't it? There's easily room enough to add 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: A Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic dock case that isn't too flashy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case that holds plenty of odds and ends. Only con is that you can't stuff the zipped pocket full of fat controllers (like GameCube) or accessories. For what it is, I'm glad the case isn't very flashy so I don't have to worry about getting mugged. And the shoulder strap included is good enough for a 6'1 guy like me. Would totally suggest for anyone looking for a good and cozy dock case that doesn't expose itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because it will hold the Joy-Con grip and two pro controllers. This case holds all the pieces as shown in the product pictures. Gets a little tight when you throw in the HDMI cable and power/charging cables for both pro controllers into the lid pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for me!
customer_reviews.text: This case does a beautiful job of protecting and transporting my Nintendo Switch and accessories safely. The slots for the controllers fit perfectly. I enjoy the fact that I can carry 2 pro controllers and 2 sets of joy-cons all in one case. There’s also a good pocket to carry controller cables as well as HDMI. I highly recommend this case to anybody thinking of buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Randamus

customer_reviews.title: Best case for multiple pro controllers
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking everywhere for a case that allows me to bring more than 1 pro controller. This is the only case that I've found, so if youre looking for a good quality case that brings all the normal stuff, but allows you also bring more than 1 pro controller, this is the one. When fully packed, I can bring 2 pro controllers and 2 full sets of joycons, so 4 ppl can play.
customer_reviews.author: John Yu

customer_reviews.title: amazing case
customer_reviews.text: this case holds everything I have for the switch except the controller dock but thats not a big issue since I hardly ever use it anyway (amazing controller battery life). this case is pretty with a nice texture, compact and still functional. the controller fit snuggly and come on when there is a d-pad finger guard attached
customer_reviews.author: Remington Forde

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, and mine did not stink
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled with this Switch case twice, and I am happy with this purchase. Along with the case being sturdy, the cut-out slots are nice and snug, and I use the slots designed for additional controllers to hold cords and chargers for other devices. Also, my case has no odd stench to it as describedby others. There is a mild odor similar to a new car, but it is not offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Paddypods

customer_reviews.title: Compact with a good insert for goodies
customer_reviews.text: I've only just gotten a Switch, so I didn't have much to put into the case, but having one that I could strap across my shoulder was very convenient when I headed out for the day. There's definitely room for the pro controller and any additional games I might get, but for a guy just starting out, it definitely has plenty of room for random odds and ends until I get more Switch gear.
customer_reviews.author: DC Bueller

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: I love that this case has a spot for all of my accessories. It makes transporting my Switch from house-to-house very easy. I also love that it can hold a TON of games! It also feels like a good size considering all it holds and protects.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Well made to protect your gear
customer_reviews.text: This is the best game case I've ever purchased. It's made with quality materials to provide adaquate protection for taveling with your entire system which is just what we were looking for. It holds the pro controller nicely and I appreciate the open pouch for extras in the top. I look forward to using this for many many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of strong chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Would love to give this 5 stars but due to the overwhelming chemical smell of foam insert and inside of the case I can’t. Good thing for Lysol, 😊 Sprayed the entire foam insert, inside the case and left it to dry outside for a few days, did this 3 times. After a week of doing this it took care of the smell. Other than this issue the case holds everything I need to carry my complete switch system anywhere I want to take it.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case, much better than some of the competitors. Only complaint is that one of the joycon strap holders was not cut correctly. Other than that its a fantastic product. Good quality, durable, never worried that my Switch will be harmed.
customer_reviews.author: CuttinOnions

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It’s very sturdy and was the only case I could find that would hold multiple controllers in addition to the joy-cons. It’s perfect! I do wish it came in colors other than black, but the functionality of it is definitely 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case to hold everything
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband so he could keep everything together. I love that it has a spot for the small black slide on controller piece. Those are so small and get lost easily but this case keeps everything safe and protected very well! Great purchase. He is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Denvr

customer_reviews.title: great switch case
customer_reviews.text: stores almost everything you need to travel with your switch- cant fit the steering wheels in, but wouldnt expect that. it is rugged and well made. The zipper feels study and the interior foam is solid.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the Nintendo Switch. Came sealed, yet when opened smelled strongly of cigarettes! At this time I can only give it a 4 star due to the strong cigarette smell when the case is opened and I have only had the item for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son got a Switch for his birthday and we bought him this storage case. It is very well made, well put together, holds everything he needs, and looks sleek and stylish. Great value, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LilGracie

customer_reviews.title: Holds it well.
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my Switch products well. They fit snuggly and I feel they're safe and protected. However, my daughter said she purchased the same product and the zipper broke within 2 weeks. To be honest, I haven't really used it for travel yet. It's just to secure all my Switch items in one safe spot, near my TV. So I barely use the zipper. So far, for me, it's been ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Megan jerez

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Each switch accessory fits perfectly in the case. It's firm enough to keep things from not moving around, but light enough to not break anything. Even has space for smaller accessories on the top pouch. The exterior is hard enough where I feel it could take hits without damaging the components inside.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great SWITCH case
customer_reviews.text: This case hold everything! Great protection. My ONLY issues is that sometimes the Pro Controllers turn on in the case (if you do not turn off the Switch completely) and run the battery down. BUT I'd highly recommend this case anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jenay Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything! Not too bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect when you need to take all of your switch equipment with you. It holds 2 pro controllers, the switch, the joycon grip, cords, and has space in the top zipper to squeeze in an extra set of joycons (4 total) It’s a large bag but it’s not impossibly bulky. I fit this bag inside my large biking chrome backpack if that tells you anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing and traveling
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect for storing and traveling, the pre cuts are perfect. The only thing I dont like is that when you close the top to zip it the buttons get pressed on the controllers from the mid section where you store the games and phone if it was removable it would be better but overall I still give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. I do see the concerns from some reviews where the buttons on the remotes might get pressed...but I’m able to just throw the remotes in the slot for a consol controller and that solves the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cera Brown

customer_reviews.title: a very big mistake !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed because of case design against the price, the case will push the nintendo switch pro bottoms on & that will lead to leakage the battery, Don't buy it be careful
customer_reviews.author: Dr. AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, protective carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good carrying case for my entire switch setup but did not want a soft bag like many of the backbacks you see. This case is perfect for carrying your entire switch and all the accessories and protecting them in transit. Snug fit for everything, preventing any jostling or movement.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I have room for all my controllers!
customer_reviews.text: There are many similarly sized cases available, but most of them only have one extra space for a controller. This has two, and you can even fit another, if you don't take the dock. I use a much smaller adapter, so I don't need to take my dock along. I've been impressed with the durability so far, although I've only used it on a couple flights.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Case not deep enough causing pressure on components
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a well built case. It's sturdy and the inner foam cut well to fit the console and controllers but the issue is with it not being deep enough causing the shoulder buttons to be pressed draining the batteries. I thought I had defective controllers for a while before finally figuring this out. This issue makes this case almost worthless for me and I no longer like to use it after having barely any use to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Impressive case
customer_reviews.text: This is the most protective and best value hard case I've seen. The foam within the case is hard enough to protect your precious Switch and accessories. There's a very convenient zipper pocket in the top cover which is great for cables.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Switch Case
customer_reviews.text: This case has been amazing. I travel around a lot with the switch and it holds the dock and all my games and controllers perfectly. I feel very confident in this case to keep everything safe even if I was to drop the case.
customer_reviews.author: TNDealFinder

customer_reviews.title: This case is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the case to carry my Switch in. This is my 2and one the 1st one I bought for my son. It's well worth it. I probably would be paying double if I bought it in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Teawn Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Large, but does carry alot
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger in person, but it does hold alot of accessories. Foam padding needs to air out a bit but hardly a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK

customer_reviews.title: Works just as described!
customer_reviews.text: All the items fit snuggly in their respective foam cutouts. No jostling that I noticed. This is a perfect case for those wanting to transport two pro controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Guzzy620

customer_reviews.title: Best switch case for the money hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This case is an excellent choice when looking to protect your Nintendo switch. I love it. It fits all my controllers including 2 pro controllers. I recommend this awesome case.
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Great case, carries everything securely.
customer_reviews.text: This case is fantastic. Has a cutout in the foam for every part of the Switch and great elastic pockets for the games. Holds everything tightly and securely for travel. Even has an extra removable piece of foam that can be removed if you have your Switch in a protective shell case!
customer_reviews.author: Garet

customer_reviews.title: Best case yet
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a case that could fit my switch and all the accessories. This case is exactly what i was looking for, it is heavy duty and keeps the controllers from constntly being knocked. I definitely would recommend this for someone with several accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and versatile
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend loves it! The outside case is nice and solid, big enough to hold all his equipment and then some, but also small enough for easy transportation. I really liked that you have the option to make the foam space bigger for your switch when it has a hard case on it. The foam is more solid and less soft than i expected, but it doesn't take away from the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: If u travel alot i advise u to get one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carrying case because i got tired of carrying my switch in the carrying case (it holds my switch and cartridges only) and everything else in a bookbag. Now instead of carrying my switch and everything else in my bookbag. I can place everything in the slots that holds everything that comes with the switch plus two pro controllers and two joy cons attached to the grips. It keeps everything safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sincere Menace

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The product is well made .. sturdy , everything fits good the reason for low stars the case came dirty and it has a tiny dent on the corner.. not sure if I got a used item? ..but after cleaning it and ignoring the dent it works as stated , I use the shoulder strap looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly nice case. Protects the console and extras whilst being organized at the same time. Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Total protection
customer_reviews.text: This product delivers for sure. No way your system could be damaged in travel with this much protection. Used it for travel. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Use it every week
customer_reviews.text: My oldest heads to my in-laws house every weekend (so we can have a break) and she takes the switch with her in this case. It's been fantastic and an easy and secure way to carry the switch around.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Carries almost everything.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Travel all the time with it. If there was one thing I’d add to it would be a way to fit another pro controller spot in it, but there’s probably not enough room. And for some reason there weren’t any cut outs for the 2 micro sd cards, but not a big deal. Can’t go wrong with this guy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Claro

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed with this carrying case. Would definitely would recommend getting this for your Nintendo Switch to transport or just to store
customer_reviews.author: Marty B

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of stuff and is very helpful for traveling with all of the switch components.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case for that it is, the only problem is it can drain the batteries of your controllers when the L and R and being pressed the whole time. Haven't actually had any problems on my controller dying after a 2-hour trip, so it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Waste of space
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem like this case was even designed for switch. The controllers protrude from the bottom so if you put even a small amount of stuff in the lid zipper compartment it pushes the buttons on the top of the controller. There is way too much foam between compartments, it's not necessary and wastes space. Not designed for real world use that has any non Nintendo equipment such as charging controllers, different docks, cables, accessories.
customer_reviews.author: GameMaker

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive
customer_reviews.text: If you want to carry everything and then some, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: B. K. S.

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: this case is soo good. its a sturdy case. I have already used it to travel with my switch. I love all the space for everything.
customer_reviews.author: YourCuteTexan

customer_reviews.title: All my Switch stuff...in one container
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case very much. It fits all my things, including Pokeball, game, three pairs of Joy-Cons and handles, charger, stand, games, TV interface, etc. I really could fit everything in one container, which is all I wanted. The box is quite nice; it fits all the objects perfectly. I could recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Case Right Now
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the official Nintendo Switch case but since I had to carry my pro controllers in a separate bag, I decided it was time to upgrade. This case fits everything perfectly. I'm super happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product looks great lots of storage. Gave to my niece for her birthday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, $$ but protects the bits and pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, lots of room for parts. Everything fits well. Good protection for a unit that travels a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secured but controllers will get constantly turned on.
customer_reviews.text: The case is great except the fact that my controllers top buttons get pressed and turn on the controllers constantly which is killing my batteries, especially since I move around with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great for literally everything!
customer_reviews.text: Took my switch to Costa Rica with this travel case. And it’s by far the best switch case out on the market. Carries literally everything without a problem. Easy packing and easy taking everything out. Strongly recommend this case to all switch owners.
customer_reviews.author: L. Woolworth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much fits everything you need for a Switch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much fits everything you need for a Switch; and is probably the only Carry Case you'd want to transport all NS console & accessories. Only problem is there there's a strong chemical smell within the case which is not going ever after airdrying.
customer_reviews.author: Ram Ganesh

customer_reviews.title: Protects the Switch very well! Kid & dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: Protects the Switch very well! Protects it from the kids and the dogs when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: UOakford2

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: plenty of space in the mesh zippy part for cords games, game cube controller converter, etc. Exactly what I was hoping for, even the zipper and outside case have a very nice feel to them very sturdy,
customer_reviews.author: James Bean

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder strap is the best thing. If you need to alter space in this case, just take a knife and trim away some of the padding. Can hold the switch (with a protective case), 4 controllers, switch foldable stand, cables and wires.
customer_reviews.author: Gaetano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to bring my switch with me everywhere, it does everything it says it will. I'd say the only downside is that it cant hold more accessories such as the Pokeball or more of the things that slide onto the joycons. Other then that, it does exactly what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case! But wish it had more pockets and slots for more games
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had a cheap little switch case for too long. Time to upgrade and this one is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. The only problems i have with it are personal preferences such as the usless game card holder and i wish it was an inch taller, but i have had no problems using it and love the case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It makes carrying the Switch and all games/accessories so easy. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Really great travel and store case
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is awesome. I bought it for my 2 boys so they can take the Nintendo switch with them and my 9 year old is easily able to cary it with ease. And all of the accessories fit perfectly it there
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Good all in one carrying case.
customer_reviews.text: It's durable and takes out the worry about damage when I'm packing it in the car or carrying it with me. Pretty compact for the amount you can carry. It's absolutely snug. Nothing is accidentally falling out. But it holds the switch just a bit too snug. Hopefully it will loosen up when it breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Had random objects stuffed into it.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap foam for divided cutouts... also mine had a random alarm clock stuffed into which ruined and distorted the cutouts. Terrible An alarm clock of all things lol must be a sign... time is running out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Fits dock
customer_reviews.text: Really like being able to fit absolutely everything in here.
customer_reviews.author: Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: This works great and holds enough and is well padded
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Best quality case out there.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, large enough to fit almost my entire switch collection and better quality than the official nintendo switch case.
customer_reviews.author: Justin  Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Holds what you need it to plus some flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to have a case that was sturdy enough and could safely support and carry all of the items. I use this when I'm on the go and don't have to pull apart the existing setup on my tv
customer_reviews.author: stephen o. hart

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything you’ll need for your switch
customer_reviews.text: Holds every component,part,or controller for the switch. I’ve got two power cords (one is a car charger). My extra dock. My extra hdmi cord. My pro controller and the controller that came with the system. And Plenty of card slots for your games.
customer_reviews.author: Arvak Soulstrum

customer_reviews.title: Good case, but one flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case for carrying around your Switch and all your accessories; everything fits well and feels very secure. however, the cut for my joy-con grip with joy-cons attached only fits if I put it in upside down, which means the trigger buttons on the top get pressed frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: drains your controllers
customer_reviews.text: this case will drain your controller batteries. it presses down on the controllers l and r buttons and puts them in search mode. ALL DAY LONG. its a good case with a fatal flaw.
customer_reviews.author: shane pereira

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gonna be getting a lot of good use out of this and due to all the space it is very versatile accessories wise. Only complaint is that you can put much in the zipper pouch unless it is very slim.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Self

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying, HIGHLY RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Great carrying case. Everything fits perfectly. I'm glad I bought because I've been need one for so long. I highly reccomend buying this. It's great to have when going out of town and you can take your switch with you anywhere you go.
customer_reviews.author: Jezebel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It has almost everything to fit in and alot of space!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to go party at a friend house or traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Herrera

product_meta.title: Smatree Hard Carrying Case N600 Compatible for Nintendo Switch-Fit for Pro Controller/Ultimate Edition Pro Controller
feature_bullets: [Custom design]:Equipped with a pre-cut trapezoidal EVA. Reserve the pre-cut trapezoidal EVA, for Nintendo Switch console without crystal case.Remove the pre-cut trapezoidal EVA, for Nintendo Switch console with crystal case.Meet your different needs.

[Overall protection]:Exterior hard EVA material keeps your Nintendo Switch and accessories from shocking and collision,interior separated EVA foam slots protect them from scratches,no compression to any button.

[Large capacity]:Fits complete Nintendo Switch system(Compatible for poke ball plus,switch console, dock, power adapter, joy-con grip even with extra joy-con, joy-con straps, HDMI cable, and game cards) and extra Switch Pro controller, Ultimate Edition Pro Controller .The zippered mesh pocket enlarges room for storing HDMI cable and other small accessories, keep them organized and safe.
[Portable and flexible]:Equipped with an adjustable shoulder strap and a side handle to easily carry all of your switch set on the go.
[RISK-FREE PURCHASE]:We offer 100% money back or replacement guarantee if there is any quality problem.
